Param.Name: test mode cookie
Param.Description: Test mode cookie magic

Param.Name: tm cookie version
Param.Description: Test mode cookie version

Param.Name: tm cookie status
Param.Description: Test mode cookie value

Param.Name: frequency_LP5
Param.Description: The frequency in kHz

Param.Name: DDI Version
Param.Description: DDI version number to ensure QDUTT compatibility. (uint16 major version)[31..16] (uint16 minor version)[15..0]

Param.Name: Boot Location ID
Param.Description: After the commands have been run, or the commands have been processed. Proceed to boot to the location defined by the ID.

Option.Name: EDL
Option.Description: Device to enter Emergency Download Mode

Option.Name: FACTORY test
Option.Description: Device to enter EDL mode if test fail, reset device if test pass, after Automated factory test mode

Option.Name: FACTORY reset
Option.Description: Device reset after Automated factory test mode

Param.Name: Number of Commands
Param.Description: The number of total input commands represented in the flash partition

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

Param.Name: MRrecordoffset
Param.Description: offset into DDR flash partition where the MR data stored at

Param.Name: MRrecordsize
Param.Description: section size into DDR flash partition where the MR data stored at

Param.Name: Reportoffset
Param.Description: offset into DDR flash partition where DDI command result stored at

Param.Name: Reportsize
Param.Description: section size into DDR flash partition where DDI command result stored at

Command.Name: Read
Command.Description: Performs a read operation on DDR.

Param.Name: Start Addr
Param.Description: The starting address. Use 0 for the start of DDR.

Param.Name: End Addr
Param.Description: The ending address. Use 0 for the end of DDR.

Param.Name: Repeat Count
Param.Description: The number of times to repeat the read operation. If 0, test will repeat forever.

Param.Name: log level
Param.Description: Enable log message to print out additional test information

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command did completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Name: Memory Sub Type
Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Command.Name: Write
Command.Description: Performs a write operation on DDR.

Param.Name: Start Addr
Param.Description: The starting address. Use 0 for the start of DDR.

Param.Name: End Addr
Param.Description: The ending address. Use 0 for the end of DDR.

Param.Name: Repeat Count
Param.Description: The number of times to repeat the read operation. If 0, test will repeat forever.

BitField.Name: Random
BitField.Description: If 1, then random data is written.

BitField.Name: Invert Row
BitField.Description: If 1, then pattern will be flipped on each row. This is only used when random is not set, and it can only be used with a pattern data packet of size 1.

Param.Name: log level
Param.Description: Enable log message to print out additional test information

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

Param.Name: Random Seed
Param.Description: Seed to be used for random. If 0, then seed will be dynamically generated using a timestamp.

Param.Name: Random Stride
Param.Description: Number of 64-bit words of random data to generate. Will be memcopied repeatedly to fill entire space between start_addr and end_addr.

ParamArray.Name: Pattern Data Packet
ParamArray.Description: Pattern to use for writes. If defined, will override random.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command did completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Name: Memory Sub Type
Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Command.Name: Read-Write
Command.Description: Performs a write, followed by a read and optionally a compare.

Param.Name: Start Addr
Param.Description: The starting address. Use 0 for the start of DDR.

Param.Name: End Addr
Param.Description: The ending address. Use 0 for the end of DDR.

Param.Name: Repeat Count
Param.Description: The number of times to repeat the read operation. If 0, test will repeat forever.

BitField.Name: Verify
BitField.Description: If 1, then verify the correct data is read.

BitField.Name: Random
BitField.Description: If 1, then random data is written.

BitField.Name: Invert Row
BitField.Description: If 1, then pattern will be flipped on each row. This is only used when random is not set, and it can only be used with a pattern data packet of size 1.

BitField.Name: Cache
BitField.Description: If 1, then enable cache for DDR memory area.

Param.Name: log level
Param.Description: Enable log message to print out additional test information

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

Param.Name: Random Seed
Param.Description: Seed to be used for random. If 0, then seed will be dynamically generated using a timestamp.

Param.Name: Random Stride
Param.Description: Number of 64-bit words of random data to generate. Will be memcopied repeatedly to fill entire space between start_addr and end_addr.

ParamArray.Name: Pattern Data Packet
ParamArray.Description: Pattern to use for writes. If defined, will override random.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command did completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Name: Memory Sub Type
Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Param.Name: Delay
Param.Description: The delay in ms

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command did completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Param.Name: frequency

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command did completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Name: Memory Sub Type
Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Param.Name: Start Addr
Param.Description: The starting address. Use 0 for the start of DDR.

Param.Name: End Addr
Param.Description: The ending address. Use 0 for the end of DDR.

BitField.Name: Find
BitField.Description: If 1, then test will run repeatedly, incrementing the delay until 'Min Fails' failures are seen. Will be ignored if used with 'Self-Refresh Validate'.

BitField.Name: Random
BitField.Description: If 1, then random data is written.

BitField.Name: Self-Refresh Validate
BitField.Description: If 1, self-refresh will be enabled. If 0, sweeping tREFI refresh period.

BitField.Name: Invert Row
BitField.Description: If 1, then pattern will be flipped on each row. This is only used when random is not set, and it can only be used with a pattern data packet of size 1.

Param.Name: Min Fails
Param.Description: Number of failures to log until the test completes. The maximum failures which can be logged will need to be managed based on available flash space.

Param.Name: Delay in ms
Param.Description: Delay for which to wait between setting a DRAM pattern and validating the pattern. This delay controls the time for which to enable and disable refresh timings.

Param.Name: Random Seed
Param.Description: Seed to be used for random. If 0, then seed will be dynamically generated using a timestamp.

Param.Name: Random Stride
Param.Description: Number of 64-bit words of random data to generate. Will be memcopied repeatedly to fill entire space between start_addr and end_addr.

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.

ParamArray.Name: Pattern Data Packet
ParamArray.Description: Pattern to use for writes. If defined, will override random.

BitField.Name: Command Complete
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command completed successfully

BitField.Name: Command Failure
BitField.Description: If 1, then DDI command failed

BitField.Name: Invalid Input
BitField.Description: If 1, then invalid command input was provided

Param.Name: Memory Sub Type
Param.Description: DRAM Sub Type for x, y

Command.Name: Eye Plot
Command.Description: Performs a read or write shmoo at a specific frequency to generate a data eye plot.

Param.Description: Selects what type of data eye to generate

Param.Name: frequency

Param.Name: x_step
Param.Description: cdc step

Param.Name: y_step
Param.Description: vref step

Param.Name: Padding
Param.Description: Padding for alignment. Ignored by QDUTT.
